name: BigXthaPlug
description: '''Xavier Landum''' (born May 12, 1998), better known by his stage name '''BigXthaPlug''', is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer. Signed to [[UnitedMasters]] of [[Brooklyn|Brooklyn, New York]], he first rose to prominence for songs including "[[Texas (BigXthaPlug song)|Texas]]" and "[[Mmhmm (song)|Mmhmm]]".
